ucd.java.rps.controller

Class RPSC_PlayerOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • ucd.java.rps.controller.RPSC_InputValidations
      • ucd.java.rps.controller.RPSC_PlayerOne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class RPSC_PlayerOne
extends RPSC_InputValidations
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This controller is defined to get the values of player two from view PlayerOne.fxml Also is used to receive the data from player one and on the basis of boolean operator isLoadedfirst (if true) sending values to next controller (Player two) with current values else take values from first controller
    Author:
    akshaythakare

        public void detailsFromP2toP1(String p1Name,

        Parameters:
        p1Name - Player One name
        p2Choice - Player two choice from another controller
        p2Name - Player two name from another controller
